title: New Beginnings
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship seeks ancient knowledge
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship spends New Year's Day on the skyship Vindristjarna, each member engaging in personal pursuits.

They visit the Ancient and Honorable Guild of Philosophers to trade artifacts for knowledge about Binding Stones, Jade Pieces of Rai's Hand, Apollyon's imprisonment, and the whereabouts of Seeker's brother Frankar.
Delios the Sage provides information but requires more time for full answers, particularly regarding the prison's complexity and the location of Frankar.
The party discusses the Edge of Echoes with Faldrak Bronzehammer, who has traded for its location, and they agree to explore it together, sharing any treasure found.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship exchanges artifacts for lore and strikes a deal to journey to the Edge of Echoes with Faldrak Bronzehammer.
